Title: Guest User Browsing Functionality
Description: This test case verifies that guest users can browse the video game selection on the website and that no options for reserving or signing out games are available to them.
Pre-condition: The user is not logged in, and the application's homepage is accessible.
Steps:
1. Go to the Online Video Game Rental Store Website.onli
2. Check that a user can access and view the list of video games available for browsing.
3. Ensure there are no options for reserving or signing out games for guest users.
4. Click on multiple games and ensure game details are displayed correctly.
Expected Result: Guest users should be able to browse the video game selection, but they should not see options for reserving or signing out games.

Title: Registered User Login
Description: This test case checks if registered users can successfully log in to the application using their email and password and are redirected to their account dashboard.
Pre-condition: The user is registered with a valid email and password, and the application's homepage is accessible.
Steps:
1. Go to the Online Video Game Rental Store Website.
2. Click on the "Log In".
3. Enter a valid registered user email.
4. Enter a valid password.
5. Click the "Login" button.
Expected Result: The user should be able to log in successfully, and their account dashboard should be displayed.

Title: Game Search by Title
Description: To verify that the search functionality by title, ensuring that it returns the correct game results when users search by game title.
Pre-condition: The Online Video Game Rental Store's website homepage is accessible.
Steps:
1. Go to the Online Video Game Rental Store Website.
2. Click on the "Log In".
3. Enter a valid registered user email.
4. Enter a valid password.
5. Click the "Login" button.
6. Use the search feature and enter a game title.
7. Click the "Search" button.
8. Check that the search results include the specified game title.
9. Click on the game title.
Expected Result: Searching by game title should return the relevant game name, and the details should be accurate.

Title: Sorting Search Results by Availability
Description: To Verify that if the application can correctly sort the list of games by availability in ascending order, and whether reserving a game reduces its availability.
Pre-condition: The application's homepage is accessible, and games are available for
Steps:
1. Go to the Online Video Game Rental Store Website.
2. Click on the "Log In".
3. Enter a valid registered user email.
4. Enter a valid password.
5. Click the "Login" button.
6. Browse available games.
7. Click on the "Sort by Availability" option.
8. Check that the list of games is sorted in ascending order of availability.
9. Reserve a game with low availability.
Expected Result: Games should be sorted by availability, and reserving a game should reduce its availability.

Title: Registered User Reservation
Description: This test case verifies that registered users can reserve games, making them unavailable for other users, and that the reserved games appear in the user's list.
Pre-condition: The user is logged in, and games are available for reservation.
Steps:
1. Go to the Online Video Game Rental Store Website.
2. Click on the "Log In" button.
3. Enter a valid registered user email.
4. Enter a valid password.
5. Click the "Login" button
6. Browse available games.
7. Click the "Reserve" button for a game with availability.
8. Verify that the game is reserved and no longer available for others.
9. Check the user's reserved games list.
Expected Result: The user should be able to reserve games, and the reserved games should appear in their list.

Title: New Game Rental Duration
Description: To ensures that new games have a rental duration of three days and that they are automatically deleted from the user's computer upon expiry.
Pre-condition: The user is logged in, and a new game is available for rental.
Steps:
1. Go to the Online Video Game Rental Store Website.
2. Click on the "Log In".
3. Enter a valid registered user email.
4. Enter a valid password.
5. Click the "Login" button.
6. Browse available games
7. Choose a new game for rental.
8. Verify that the rental duration is 3 days.
9. Wait for the rental period to expire.
Expected Result: New games should have a 3-day rental duration, and they should be automatically deleted upon expiry.

Title: Payment with Credit Card
Description: To verifies that users can complete payment for a game using a credit card, and they can access the game after successful payment.
Pre-condition: The user is logged in and has added a game to their cart.
Steps:
1. Go to the Online Video Game Rental Store Website.
2. Click on the "Log In".
3. Enter a valid registered user email.
4. Enter a valid password.
5. Click the "Login" button.
6. Browse available games.
7. Add a game to the cart.
8. Proceed to the payment page.
9. Enter valid credit card details.
10. Submit the payment.
Expected Result: The payment should be processed successfully, and the user should be able to access the downloaded game.

Title: Payment with PayPal
Description: To confirms that users can complete payment for a game using PayPal and access the game after successful payment.
Pre-condition: The user is logged in and has added a game to their cart.
Steps:
1. Go to the Online Video Game Rental Store Website.
2. Click on the "Log In".
3. Enter a valid registered user email.
4. Enter a valid password.
5. Click the "Login" button.
6. Browse available games.
7. Add a game to the cart.
8. Proceed to the payment page.
9. Select the PayPal payment option.
10. Follow the PayPal login and payment process.
Expected Result: The payment through PayPal should be processed successfully, and the user should be able to access the downloaded game.

Title: Maximum Number of User Allowance
Description: To verifiy that the system's ability to handle 2500 simultaneous users and monitors system performance.
Pre-condition: The system is in working condition.
Steps:
1. Go to the Online Video Game Rental Store Website.
2. Click on the "Log In".
3. Enter a valid registered user email.
4. Enter a valid password.
5. Click the "Login" button.
6. Browse available games.
7. Simulate the presence of 2500 total users on the system simultaneously.
Expected Result: The system should handle 2,500 simultaneous users without significant performance degradation or errors.

Title: Cross-Browser Compatibility on Windows 10
Description: To check the compatibility of the website with various Windows 10 desktop browsers.
Pre-condition: The website is accessible via Windows 10 desktop browsers.
Steps:
1. Go to the Online Video Game Rental Store Website.
2. Click on the "Log In".
3. Enter a valid registered user email.
4. Enter a valid password.
5. Click the "Login" button.
6. Browse available games.
7. Access the website from Windows 10 desktop browsers, including Chrome, Firefox, and Edge.
Expected Result: The website should be compatible with the specified Windows 10 desktop browsers, and all features should work as intended.

Title: Cross-Browser Compatibility on Apple iPad
Description: To check the compatibility of the website with Apple iPad and Safari browser.
Pre-condition: The website is accessible via Apple iPad with Safari.
Steps:
1. Go to the Online Video Game Rental Store Website.
2. Click on the "Log In".
3. Enter a valid registered user email.
4. Enter a valid password.
5. Click the "Login" button.
6. Browse available games.
7. Access the website from an Apple iPad using Safari.
Expected Result: The website should be compatible with Apple iPad and Safari, and all features should work as intended.

Title: Security Testing - Personal Information Data Leak Prevention
Description: To check attempts to access personal and financial information without authorization to verify data leak prevention.
Pre-condition: The website is in working condition.
Steps:
1. Go to the Online Video Game Rental Store Website.
2. Click on the "Log In".
3. Enter a valid registered user email.
4. Enter a valid password.
5. Click the "Login" button.
6. Attempt to access personal information of a user without proper authorization.
Expected Result: The application should not allow unauthorized access to another user's personal information. The application should only display the information of the currently logged-in user.

Title: Download Link Availability
Description: To verify whether registered users are provided with download links for games they have signed out.
Pre-condition: The user is logged in, and they have signed out a game.
Steps:
1. Go to the Online Video Game Rental Store Website.
2. Click on the "Log In".
3. Enter a valid registered user email.
4. Enter a valid password.
5. Click the "Login" button.
6. Sign out a game.
7. Check for a download link.
8. Verify that the user receives a download link upon the signed-out game.
Expected Result: The user should receive a download link for the game they have signed out of, either via email or in their user dashboard.

Title: Test for Maximum Game Rentals
Description: This test case verifies that registered users cannot exceed the maximum allowed game rentals (three titles) at a given time.
Pre-condition: The user is logged in, and they have already rented three games.
Steps:
1. Go to the Online Video Game Rental Store Website.
2. Click on the "Log In".
3. Enter a valid registered user email.
4. Enter a valid password.
5. Click the "Login" button.
6. Browse available games.
7. Attempt to rent a fourth game.
8. Verify that the system prevents the user from renting the fourth game.
9. Check the user's rented games list.
Expected Result: The system should prevent the user from renting a fourth game, and the user's rented games list should still contain the three previously rented games.

Title: Automatic Game Deletion on Expiry
Description: To verify that games are automatically deleted from the user's computer after the rental period expires.
Pre-condition: The user has rented a game, and the rental period has expired.
Steps:
1. Go to the Online Video Game Rental Store Website.
2. Click on the "Log In".
3. Enter a valid registered user email.
4. Enter a valid password.
5. Click the "Login" button.
6. Browse available games.
7. Rent a game with an expiry date.
8. Wait until the game's expiry date has passed.
9. Check the user's computer for the presence of the game.
Expected Result: After the rental period expires, the game should be automatically deleted from the user's computer, and it should no longer available on the user's computer, indicating it has been automatically deleted.

Title: User's Ability to View Reserved Games
Description: To verifies that registered users can view the list of games they have reserved.
Pre-condition: The user is logged in, and they have reserved games.
Steps:
1. Go to the Online Video Game Rental Store Website.
2. Click on the "Log In".
3. Enter a valid registered user email.
4. Enter a valid password.
5. Click the "Login" button.
6. Browse available games.
7. Navigate to the account or dashboard.
8. Locate the section that displays reserved games.
9. Verify that the list of reserved games is displayed.
Expected Result: The user should be able to view the list of games they have reserved in their account or dashboard.

Title: User's Ability to Update Personal Information
Description: To confirms that registered users can successfully update their personal information, such as their name, email, or password.

Steps:

Title: Game Availability Status Update
Description: To Verify that the game's status becomes available for the next registered user after expiry.
Pre-condition: User is logged in and rented a game with an expired rental period.
Steps:
1. Go to the Online Video Game Rental Store Website.
2. Click on the "Log In".
3. Enter a valid registered user email.
4. Enter a valid password.
5. Click the "Login" button.
6. Browse available games.
7. Rent a game with an expiry date.
8. Wait until the game's expiry date has passed.
9. Check the game's availability for rental by other users.
Expected Result: The game's status is updated to "available," indicating it can be rented by the next registered user.

Title: Security Testing - Financial Information Data Leak Prevention
Description: To Verify that the application's security measures prevent unauthorized access to user's financial information.
Pre-condition: User is logged into the application.
Steps:
1. Go to the Online Video Game Rental Store Website.
2. Click on the "Log In".
3. Enter a valid registered user email.
4. Enter a valid password.
5. Click the "Login" button.
6. Navigate to the payment or financial section.
7. Attempt to access another user's financial information (For Ex: credit card details, PayPal account).
Expected Result: The application should not allow unauthorized access to another user's financial information. Financial data should be protected and only accessible to authorized users.
